## LinearCardContainer.setSelected() method

Sets whether the given card is marked as selected.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setSelected(index: number, selected: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | Index of the card to set. |
|  selected | boolean | Selection state to set the card to. |

**Returns:**

void
